definition: to win without needing to even lift a finger/victory presented on a platter
to hang up (a phone)/to leave a computer etc running (idling, downloading, or playing a game in one's stead etc)
(coll.) (gaming) to progress to the next level/to level up
(video games) PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG)/battle royale game/last-man-standing game/to play PUBG (or similar game)/to win at PUBG (or similar game)
(coll.) to cling to sb influential or famous
poisoned milk/contaminated milk/refers to 2008 PRC scandal involving milk products adulterated with melamine 三聚氰胺[san1 ju4 qing2 an4]
member of same class, team, work group etc/teammate
to hang sb up and beat him
to respond to an assault by killing one's assailant
to make a comeback/(of a doctor's assessment of the gender of a fetus) to turn out to be wrong
rank/class/(Japanese martial arts and board games) dan
player (of a game)/enthusiast (audio, model planes etc)
to make an in-app purchase in a game
